ni.protobuf.types.vector_conversion
===================================

.. py:module:: ni.protobuf.types.vector_conversion

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Methods to convert to and from scalar protobuf messages.



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   ni.protobuf.types.vector_conversion.AnyScalarType


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   ni.protobuf.types.vector_conversion.extended_properties_from_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.vector_conversion.extended_properties_to_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.vector_conversion.vector_to_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.vector_conversion.vector_from_protobuf


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: extended_properties_from_protobuf(attributes, extended_properties)

   Convert an AttributeValue map and insert values into an ExtendedPropertyDictionary.


.. py:function:: extended_properties_to_protobuf(extended_properties)

   Convert an ExtendedPropertyDictionary to an AttributeValue map.


.. py:data:: AnyScalarType
   :type:  typing_extensions.TypeAlias

.. py:function:: vector_to_protobuf(value, /)

   Convert a Vector python object to a protobuf vector_pb2.Vector.


.. py:function:: vector_from_protobuf(message, /)

   Convert the protobuf vector_pb2.Vector to a Python Vector.
